thread.title: Liverpool star Philippe Coutinho pips Neymar to the award of being crowned Brazil’s best player in Europe
thread.title_full: Liverpool star Philippe Coutinho pips Neymar to the award of being crowned Brazil’s best player in Europe

author: rforrester
title: Liverpool star Philippe Coutinho pips Neymar to the award of being crowned Brazil’s best player in Europe
text:
Comments PHILIPPE COUTINHO has pipped Neymar to the award of being crowned Brazil’s best player in Europe. 
The Liverpool ace picked up the annual 2016 Samba Gold award which has previously been won by the likes of Kaka and Thiago Silva. Reuters 2 Philippe Coutinho has been crowned Brazil’s best player in Europe 
Barcelona’s Neymar had won it for the previous two years but could only finish second behind Coutinho with Real Madrid’s Casemiro rounding the top three. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Liverpool news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The 24-year-old picked up 32.13% of the votes which is decided by a combined poll of journalists, current and ex-professionals and supporters. 
Coutinho has become the talisman in Jurgen Klopp’s side scoring 13 goals in the calendar year and will hope to replicate his fine form when he recovers from injury. Getty Images Neymar could only muster second spot Samba Gold previous winners
